attributes.action: GIVE Stephen Oake  POLICEMAN KILLED ON DUTY THE GEORGE CROSS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS BRAVE MAN GAVE HIS OWN LIFE TO SAVE OTHERS. UNARMED HE TACKELED A TERRORIST SAVING THE LIFE OF OTHERS AROUND HIM. HE MEETS THE REQUREMENTS FOR THE G.C. IF HE HAD BEEN A SOLDIER HE WOULD HAVE GOT THE VICTORIA CROSS. HONOUR THIS BRAVE MAN WITH THE AWARD HIS MEMORY DESERVES
